title: Ae/Pr视觉特效+转场BCC插件包 2019 v12.0.4 Win/Mac版
author: 大众脸
content: 这是一篇关于 Boris Continuum Complete (BCC) 插件包的介绍文章。BCC 是一款功能强大的视觉特效和转场插件，适用于 Adobe After Effects 和 Premiere Pro，提供上百种特效，包括字幕、3D粒子、光线、烟雾、火、调色、抠像、遮罩、跟踪等风格化工具。本文介绍了 BCC 2019 的主要更新内容，并提供了适用于 Windows 和 Mac 系统的下载链接。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS6 – CC 2019, Premiere Pro CS6 – CC 2019

installation_instructions_win: 卸载旧版本，然后安装插件程序，安装过程中选择No License
复制注册补丁文件夹里面的文件到C:\Program Files\BorisFX\ContinuumAE\12\lib 完成替换注册
完成安装，打开软件使用插件
other.update_notes_en: Continuum 2019 is the latest major upgrade for the most comprehensive plug-in collection on the market. Key features include the rebirth of Particle Illusion, the famed motion graphics generator, new Title Studio image-processing shaders such as glows, rays, and blurs for visually-stunning titles and lower thirds, new Mocha Essentials workspace with 4 new spline tools like magnetic edge snapping and geometric shapes for faster tracking and masking, new point-driven parameter tracking powered by Mocha, and overall GPU-acceleration.
